summary:
Moves the grindstone and workbench outside of the Lakeview Manor on the exact same spot of the drafting table, chest and carpenters workbench.
Why? Because I removed those construction items (markfordelete console command) once my manor was finished, they were utterly useless now and I wanted to make some free space there.
descriptionHtml:
[color=YELLOW][b]!! Make sure your lakeview manor is completely build with the upgrades you want to have (through workbenches and steward) before activating this mod !!
!! If you start a new game or switch character you need to deactivate the mod until the manor is build !![/b][/color]
[u]Requires Hearthfire DLC[/u]
Nexus Exclusive Mod -- Do NOT upload this file to other sites.

My main mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31380/?]Lakeview Extended - Hearthfire[/url]

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Intro:~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]
This mod moves the grindstone and workbench outside of the Lakeview Manor on the exact same spot of the drafting table, chest and carpenters workbench.
Why? Because I removed those construction items once my manor was finished, they were utterly useless now and I wanted to make some free space there.
Plus my npcs/ followers sometimes tried to get over the grindstone/ workbench so they got stuck on them, now when these items are moved more to the right the npcs no longer stumble over them.

You will need to remove the drafting table, chest, carpenters workbench manually in game by opening the console, select each item and type "markfordelete" then save and load again.
But make a back-up save first in case you delete the wrong item.
Just beware that when uninstalling this mod the drafting table, chest, carpenters workbench will not return, you use "markfordelete" on them so they are gone forever.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Installation:~~~~~~[/b][/color]
* Always make back-up saves before trying new mods.
* Make sure you are far away from Lakeview manor before installing.
* Nexus Mod Manager: download the .ESP file and activate it to install.
* Manual: open the 7zip file, then drag and drop the .ESP file into Skyrim's Data folder.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Uninstallation:~~~~[/b][/color]
* Make sure you are far away from Lakeview manor before uninstalling, wait 40+ days.
* You can deactivate and uninstall from Nexus Mod Manager, or manually delete the mod.

[color=ORANGE][b]~~~~~~Extra:~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]
* To let [b]wait time[/b] go faster, open console and type "TFC", one day will pass in a second now instead of waiting for every single hour to pass, when done type "TFC" again.


[color=#f9cb9c][size=1]Disclaimer:
In case Nexus website shuts down and/or I am no longer around, then you can upload/convert this mod to other websites for the purpose of FREE redistribution. (never charge money for it)
Though you must credit me as the original author and I will always retain all rights[color=#f9cb9c][size=1] and permissions[/size][/color] to this mod.[/size][/color]
author: Ac3s
